characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance

characterDescription:
Tvlakv is a Thaylen slavemaster. He was at the head of the caravan that sold Kaladin to Highprince Sadeas's warcamp after traveling from Alethkar to the Shattered Plains.
He later headed the caravan escorting Shallan to the Shattered Plains.
He tells Shallan that her Almighty is a farce, but she replies that if he is not, then Damnation itself awaits men like him.
She inspects the cage in which five slaves huddle and tells Tvlakv that they are hers now, to which he balks.
However, she tells him that she saved his life, and that he will give her the slaves in payment. Dues in recompense for her soldiers protecting him and his worthless life.
She also tells him that he will give her their writs of slavery.
She then asks him to sell her one of his wagons, for which he demands five sapphire broams.
But, he tells her that she can't have his parshmen.
